name: OR_LOG
description: The OR_LOG table contains information about surgical and procedural log (ORL) records.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedural log record for this row.

columns.name: SURGERY_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the case was performed.

columns.name: CASE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which identifies the type of the surgical log.

columns.name: CASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The classification category ID for the surgical log.

columns.name: TRAUMA_CASE_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates whether this is a trauma case.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the procedural log record.

columns.name: POSTOP_CONSCIOUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the consciousness level of the patient during post-op.

columns.name: PREOP_CONSCIOUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the consciousness level of the patient during pre-op.

columns.name: PREOP_BED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed to which the patient is to be assigned for pre-op.

columns.name: PREOP_BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: PACU_BED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed to which the patient is to be assigned for post-op.

columns.name: PACU_BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: NUM_OF_PANELS
columns.description: The number of panels in the surgical log.

columns.name: REQUEST_PERSON
columns.description: The name of the person requesting the surgery

columns.name: TOTAL_TIME_NEEDED
columns.description: The total time needed for the log in minutes

columns.name: REFER_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the physician who referred the patient associated with the log.

columns.name: PAT_PREOP_COND_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the patient's condition before the surgery in the surgical log.

columns.name: PAT_POSTOP_COND_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the patient's condition after the surgery in the surgical log.

columns.name: ASA_RATING_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's ASA rating category number for the procedure. ASA stands for American Society of Anesthesiologists. This column is frequently used to link to ZC_OR_ASA_RATING.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_TO_C_NAME
columns.description: The category list which indicates where the patient was discharged to in the surgical log.

columns.name: DISPOSITION_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the patient was discharged. NOTE: Only the time value of this field is to be used. The date should always be 1/1/1900 for historical reasons.

columns.name: EXPIRED_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates whether the patient died during the surgery.

columns.name: EXPIRED_WHERE_C_NAME
columns.description: If needed, indicates where the patient expired.

columns.name: EXPIRED_TIME
columns.description: If needed, records the time at which the patient expired

columns.name: X_RAYS_TAKEN_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates whether X-rays were taken in the surgical log.

columns.name: PREOP_XRAYS_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates whether pre-op X-rays were taken in the surgical log.

columns.name: PREOP_VISIT_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates whether there was a pre-Op Visit for the surgical log.

columns.name: LATEX_ALLERGIC_YN
columns.description: Yes/no flag which indicates for the surgical log if the patient has a latex allergy.

columns.name: EST_BLOOD_LOSS
columns.description: The estimated amount of blood lost during the surgery.

columns.name: ROOM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the room in which the procedure in the procedural log was performed. This column is frequently used to link to CLARITY_SER.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location where the procedure was performed. This column is frequently used to link to CLARITY_LOC.

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category list which represents the priority of the surgical log

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the log status (Posted, Unposted, Voided, etc.) associated with the log record. This column is frequently used to link to  ZC_OR_STATUS.

columns.name: SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The service category ID for the surgical log.

columns.name: SCHED_START_TIME
columns.description: The date and time at which the surgery in the surgical log was performed.

columns.name: VOID_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: A category list which indicates the reason the log was voided. It is entered by the user that voided that log.

columns.name: CHECKIN_INSTANT
columns.description: The date and time at which the log was checked-in.

columns.name: PATIENT_ESCORT
columns.description: The person escorting the patient for the surgery. This is a free text value.

columns.name: CASE_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical case attached to this log.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATE_DATE
columns.description: The creation date of this surgical log.

columns.name: RESEARCH_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the candidacy of the surgical log for research.

columns.name: PACU1_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the patient's location in the PACU.

columns.name: REASON_OVER_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the reason for overnight stay.

columns.name: POSTOP_DEST_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which represents the patient's post-op destination.

columns.name: IS_CONFIDENTIAL_YN
columns.description: Yes/No flag which indicates whether the log is confidential or not (yes indicates confidential).

columns.name: ADDENDA_COUNT
columns.description: The number of addenda on posted logs. This will return the number of addenda on the log if the log status is posted, otherwise, returns null.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID_VERB_YN
columns.description: Yes/No value indicating whether or not the patient was identified verbally.

columns.name: PAT_HAS_ID_BAND_YN
columns.description: Yes/No value indicating whether or not the patient has an ID band.

columns.name: PAT_BLOOD_BAND_YN
columns.description: Yes/No value indicating whether or not the patient has a blood band.

columns.name: BLOOD_BAND_NUMBER
columns.description: The number of the patient's blood band.

columns.name: DESTINATION
columns.description: The free text destination of the other report.

columns.name: INTRAOP_DISCH_TO_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates to where the patient was discharged.

columns.name: SURGEON_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the surgeons.   The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: ANES_STAFF_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the anesthesia staff.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: OR_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the operating room.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: SURG_STAFF_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the surgical staff.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: SURG_EQUIP_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the surgical equipment.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: ANES_EQUIP_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the anesthesia equipment.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: INSTR_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the surgical instruments.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: PROC_COST
columns.description: The cost associated with the procedures.  The item from which this column extracts is no longer populated in released workflows, but may include historical data.

columns.name: VOID_COMMENTS
columns.description: The free text comments entered when the log was voided.

columns.name: LOG_ACCEPTED_YN
columns.description: Yes/No flag indicating whether or not the log was accepted in Log Entry.

columns.name: PROC_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: Level of the procedure for the log.

columns.name: OR_TIME_EVTS_ENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the timing events status of the case. This is used to see if the case is not started, in progress or done.

columns.name: PROC_NOT_PERF_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the reason why the procedure was not performed.

columns.name: PROC_NOT_PERF_COM
columns.description: Stores the comments, if the procedure not performed.

columns.name: LOG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of log category number for the log.

columns.name: PHASE_TWO_BED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed to which the patient is to be assigned for Post-Op Phase II.

columns.name: PHASE_TWO_BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the case ID (ORC) for this log.

columns.name: IS_CLINICAL_TRL_YN
columns.description: Indicates if the log is a clinical trial log.

columns.name: BLOOD_LOSS_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Unit of measure of blood loss.

columns.name: SCHED_INSTR_EDIT_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the scheduling instructions were edited.

columns.name: PAT_INSTR_EDITED_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient instructions were edited.

columns.name: NURSE_NOTES_EDIT_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the nursing notes have been edited.

columns.name: POSITION_NOTES_E_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the positioning notes have been edited.

columns.name: EMERG_STATUS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether there is an emergency status for this log. If the log does have an emergency status, this column will display Y.  The column will display N if there is not an emergency status and null if the status was not set.

columns.name: IS_JOINT_RVSN_YN
columns.description: This item documents whether the log is for a revision of a joint procedure. It is used for Surgical Care Improvement Project (SCIP) reports.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The record status category number for this log.

columns.name: FORM_ID_COUNTER
columns.description: Annotated images form ID counter.

columns.name: CHRGS_AT_ADDEND_YN
columns.description: This item is populated as Yes or No when an addendum is filed, or when log charges are calculated, to indicate whether there are charges to be sent. This item will be set to 1-Yes if there are any new charges, charges to be updated, or charges to be cancelled, or if there are any charge errors or warnings. Otherwise, this item will be set to 2-No. If this item is blank, the log charges will be calculated on the fly by the Log Charges Work List to evaluate whether to include the log in the report.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PHYS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the physician who is the primary physician for this log.
